Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: The hotel was full so we had a room right in the eaves Great view but tiny and slow lift
Positive_Review: The bed WAS extra comfy The breakfast was the usual but nicely presented and tasty

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: When we returned to our room late one afternoon the room had not been cleaned no reason offered Also they were reluctant to re stock the tea and coffee for some odd reason When we complained we were given 1 tea bag and 1 sachet of coffee
Positive_Review: location was ok if you know paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Noise from other apartment building all night affected our sleep but hotel management solved this issue
Positive_Review: Bed was comfortable Room nicely appointed but small

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Small elevator A sign indicates that they have an historical stairway therefore not possible to modify to accommodate a bigger elevator
Positive_Review: Cozy hotel family friendly quiet room very confortable The staff was welcoming and fun to deal with The location close to Paris main attractions was just perfect for us as the kids didn t have to walk too much

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: noisy sound from construction near my room and the room may need extra lock otherwise the key card
Positive_Review: Nice location close to shopping area and easy to get metro

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: We didn t stay long enough to be overly bothered but it felt like a hotel that could benefit from a bit of time off
Positive_Review: Location was great rooms small but ok staff were nice parking relatively nearby

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Wifi not so efficent and the room wasnt very clean Lastly the day of my check out the front desk lady informed me that there was no help for my luggage to be brought diwn
Positive_Review: Location was great

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Do not leave your valuables behind when leaving the room My mom left behind a 100 Euro bill in her wallet which was in the closet and it was missing when we came back I reported to the reception but they didn t do much about it and their response was that the manager was on leave and is not responding to voicemail
Positive_Review: The location is quite good walk able distance to the Eiffel Tower

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fantastic location clean excellent staff lovely family room with large bathroom Very comfortable Will stay here again Highly recommended The cafes shops and neighborhood is a hidden diamond

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Felt like we were too far away from the action Not enough restaurants cafes in the area Many places closed Sunday Monday Too far from metro and not on a convenient line No one to help at metro station on Sunday and we had many questions
Positive_Review: Staff was very accommodating and went out of their way to help us Bathroom was big and beds were comfortable

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: The room was basically the bed no bigger It was not a problem as we only slept there but it was quite expensive
Positive_Review: Location was great for us and the hotel was really cosy

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Located close to the attractions Very friendly staff Rooms were small but well maintained Historic building maintains it s charm We will certainly stay again

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Fire alarm at 03 15 Faulty system Room decor looking a bit tired
Positive_Review: Bed was extremely comfortable Location 5 min to river and Eifel tower Great shower

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Breakfast extortionate at 19 Excellent cafes nearby
Positive_Review: Bedroom comfortable if a little small for two people Location not too bad if you are prepared to walk

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Water pression is low on the 7th floor and the elevator very tiny but that is also Parisian charm
Positive_Review: We loved the room with a terrace and a view over Parisian rooftops and a glimpse of the Eiffel tower The bed was confortable and a large dressing The breakfast was good and nice in the veranda of the hotel Location is great in a quiet street but right next to the fancy shops of Passy and a convenient Metro station

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Internet does not work regularly Needs maintenance hotel is old but everything could work better if provided maintenance Breakfast although good is too expensive
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Mould in the bathrooms Go buy some mould killer get a scrubbing brush get rid of the mould Install a fan in the bathroom to help get the steam out That s the cause of the mould The mould is completely unacceptable
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely helpful friendly The hotel is located in a very fashionable part of Paris is easily accessible to some absolute icons of Paris So many good qualities for this little gem Make no mistake it is not a Four Seasons hotel It is Best Western It is a small hard working little hotel they try to do a good job I give them 99 out of a 100 for delivering the best they can with what they have to work with The dining area is pretty the buffet was well done The express breakfast was very good value The elevator is tiny but quite quick between floors Ask for a lower floor if you don t want a long hike The decor in the lobby is timber which is lovely but makes the area dark but it s clean polished so looks impressive Same goes for the rooms Older style French decor It sits well with the overall ambiance

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: Could not think of anything some might consider the rooms and lift a bit petite but that justs adds to the character of a memorable trip
Positive_Review: This Hotel is set in the nice authentically French district of Passy and is very convient for the Metro and the Eiffel Tower We found a very good restaurant nearby for our Saturday night dinner and a good crepe restaurant for lunch This is a small character hotel located off the main rue but very good We had a double room for my wife and I and a triple room for our 3 adult children The staff were all very polite and all spoke good English We were able to leave our luggage whilst we went site seeing which was very helpfull

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were very impressed with your staff We happened to stay the night of the ISIS attacks in Paris They were very helpful in arranging a shuttle and a taxi so that our family was safely able to get to the airport to catch our flights out

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was an amazing hotel to stay at for the fact that everything you want and need to see eat is in walking distance The stay was great and helped a lot with helping us find our way The room was amazing and had the French theme that you would want Very classy for a good price

Hotel_Name: Best Western Premier Trocadero La Tour
Negative_Review: The main person on reception not very friendly or overly pleasant and seemed very disinterested in you as a paying guest We were 3 persons in the room but only 2 cups tea coffee not being replenished on a daily basis Towel hook in bathroom broken net curtain in bedroom hanging off the rail
Positive_Review: location very good and beds we very comfortable
